detail_desc: Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved Henley tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with a button placket.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved Henley tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with a button placket.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved Henley tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with a button placket.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved Henley tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with a button placket.

Straight-cut tunic in a softly draping, crinkled viscose weave. Opening with narrow ties at the top and a gathered yoke. Narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist and long balloon sleeves with a seam at the top and narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs.
Bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a collar in a broderie anglaise weave. Short puff sleeves, a small opening and concealed button at the back of the neck, and press-studs at the crotch.
Wide, satin-covered Alice band with a pleated, braided decoration. Width 3 cm.

Fully lined, ribbed swimsuit with a fixed belt to define the waist. V-neck at the front, a deeper V-neck at the back and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Medium coverage at the back.
Suede belt that winds around the waist and ties at the front. Width 8 cm.

Wide, straight-cut, calf-length dress in soft, gently draping satin with a sheen. V-neck and a yoke on the shoulders and at the back. Long, gathered, voluminous balloon sleeves with a seam at the top and close-fitting cuffs with a covered button. Short slits in the sides.

Wide, straight-cut, calf-length dress in soft, gently draping satin with a sheen. V-neck and a yoke on the shoulders and at the back. Long, gathered, voluminous balloon sleeves with a seam at the top and close-fitting cuffs with a covered button. Short slits in the sides.

Long, wide dress in a cool viscose weave with a slight sheen. V-neck, a yoke at the back, gathered seams on the shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Gathered seam under the bust and on the skirt. Unlined.

Long, wide dress in a cool viscose weave with a slight sheen. V-neck, a yoke at the back, gathered seams on the shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Gathered seam under the bust and on the skirt. Unlined.

Long, wide dress in a cool viscose weave with a slight sheen. V-neck, a yoke at the back, gathered seams on the shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Gathered seam under the bust and on the skirt. Unlined.

Long, wide dress in an airy, printed weave with a small opening and hook-and-eye fastener at the top. Gathered yoke at the back for added volume, pleats and a drawstring with narrow ties at the front, and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves with wide cuffs. Lined.

Ankle-length dress in airy, pattern-weave fabric with stripes in shimmering metallic thread. Small frill trim around the neckline and a V-shaped opening with ties at the front. Smocked yoke front and back and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Long, voluminous sleeves and close-fitting cuffs with rounded edges and a covered button. The dress is wide and softly draping with a seam and flounce at the hem of the skirt. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in an airy cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Small frill trim around the neckline, a yoke, and a V-shaped opening with ties at the front. Gently dropped shoulders and short balloon sleeves with concealed elastication at the hems. Straight cut at the top relaxing into a flared skirt with a seam that has a small frill trim and a scalloped hem. Lined.

Ankle-length dress in an airy weave with embroidery in shimmering thread. V-neck and extra-wide, softly draping sleeves. High, tapered waist with a wide, inset trim and a gathered skirt with soft draping. Unlined.
Wide, calf-length dress in cotton twill with adjustable straps, press-studs at the sides and two chest pockets, one with a flap and button. Unlined.
Low-necked blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Buttons down the front and 3/4-length puff sleeves with inset lace trims and narrow elastication and ties at the cuffs.

Jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric. Detachable, fleece-lined hood with reflective details, a zip down the front with a chin guard, open side pockets, and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Padded at the front and back.

Wide, straight-cut blouse in a crinkled, viscose weave with gathered draping. V-neck with ties at the front and a yoke. V-shaped opening at the back of the neck and large, wide balloon sleeves with a seam at the top and covered button at the cuffs.

Straight-cut blouse in an airy weave made from a cotton and Tencel™ lyocell blend with a V-neck, pleat down the front and yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves with pleats, a small opening and ties at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, slightly stretchy cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, slightly stretchy cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, slightly stretchy cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Narrow, satin-covered Alice band with a glittery flamingo on top with a fluffy tulle body.
Jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Twisted detail at the front of the hem and a ribbed trim at the back of the hem.
Jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Twisted detail at the front of the hem and a ribbed trim at the back of the hem.

Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a sleeve placket with a link button. Rounded hem, slightly longer at the back.

Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a sleeve placket with a link button. Rounded hem, slightly longer at the back.

Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a sleeve placket with a link button. Rounded hem, slightly longer at the back.

Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a sleeve placket with a link button. Rounded hem, slightly longer at the back.

Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a sleeve placket with a link button. Rounded hem, slightly longer at the back.

Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a sleeve placket with a link button. Rounded hem, slightly longer at the back.

Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a sleeve placket with a link button. Rounded hem, slightly longer at the back.
Straight-style top in an airy, fine knit containing glittery threads with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Straight-style top in an airy, fine knit containing glittery threads with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Vest tops in soft, ribbed cotton jersey.
Vest tops in soft, ribbed cotton jersey.
5-pocket, skinny-fit jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems.
5-pocket, skinny-fit jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems.

Short dress in crinkled jersey with a wrapover front and seam at the waist with a round metal buckle and straps at one side. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.

Stylish, ankle-length trousers in a sturdy Tencel™ lyocell and wool weave with a sheen. Regular waist with a concealed waistband, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, diagonal side pockets and straight legs with creases.
Long, super-wide trousers in a softly draping weave with a glossy finish. High, elasticated waist, discreet side pockets and straight legs with creases.
Sleeveless dress in organic cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in organic cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in organic cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in organic cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in organic cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in organic cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.

Set with a strappy top, T-shirt and pair of cycling shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey. Top with narrow shoulder straps and gathers in the sides. Straight-style T-shirt with a slightly wider neckline. Cycling shorts with a wide waist panel for best fit over the tummy.

Jacket in jersey made from a polyester and cotton blend with a print motif on the chest. Mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring, zip down the front and long raglan sleeves with taped details and ribbed cuffs. Mesh-lined side pockets with a concealed zip. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.

Sports trousers in heavy jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist and side pockets with a concealed zip. Ventilated mesh section at the crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.

Sleeveless playsuit in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, pompom trim at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back. Covered buttons at the top, a wide, smocked seam at the waist and short, wide legs with lace-trimmed hems.

Shirt jacket in sturdy, washed cotton denim with smooth buttons. Collar, buttons down the front and a yoke and decorative seam at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.

Shirt jacket in sturdy, washed cotton denim with smooth buttons. Collar, buttons down the front and a yoke and decorative seam at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Suit trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and straight, wide legs with creases.
Suit trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and straight, wide legs with creases.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in a softly draping weave with a V-neck opening at the front and an opening at the back with a button at the back of the neck. Detachable tie belt at the waist and wide, ankle-length legs.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in a softly draping weave with a V-neck opening at the front and an opening at the back with a button at the back of the neck. Detachable tie belt at the waist and wide, ankle-length legs.

Oversized shirt jacket in a textured weave with a wide collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Short dress in cotton-blend sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders, 3/4-length balloon sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs. Round, ribbed neckline and a gathered seam and flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Short dress in cotton-blend sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders, 3/4-length balloon sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs. Round, ribbed neckline and a gathered seam and flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and zipped, diagonal side pockets.

Seamless body in jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. The body is designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.

Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with ribbed trims around the neckline and armholes.

Jacket in soft faux shearling with jersey trims, a stand-up collar and concealed zip with an imitation leather tab and a chin guard. Front pockets and long raglan sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Jacket in soft faux shearling with jersey trims, a stand-up collar and concealed zip with an imitation leather tab and a chin guard. Front pockets and long raglan sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. Square neckline, long sleeves, and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
